nodes.text: Ion Team's munitions expert was an otherwise unnamed clone commando attached to the 22nd Air Combat Wing. When Commander Salvo issued Order 66, this commando, along with the rest of Ion Team, questioned and disobeyed the order, allowing Jedi Masters Roan Shryne, Bol Chatak, and her Padawan Olee Starstone to escape. He was later captured along with the rest of his squad and taken to Darth Vader, who killed him and fellow commando Ras.
Though the other members of Ion Team (Climber, Trace, and Ras) are named, this commando was not given a name.
